reviewText: The film- twilight man- with  Tim Matheson and  Dean Stockwell is one of the BEST suspense films  of all times.  Everyone should have a copy of this film in their collection. BUY IT- YOU WON'T REGRET IT  - PROMISE.
Great movie but seller failed to disclose that one of the plastic "windows" had a huge crack and had been mended with tape.
